-- | OpenTheory unicode character API
--   
@package api-opentheory-unicode
@version 1.2


module Unicode
toString :: Unicode -> String
newline :: [Unicode]
decode :: IO [Either Word8 Unicode]
encode :: [Unicode] -> IO ()
reencode :: [Either Word8 Unicode] -> IO ()
hDecode :: Handle -> IO [Either Word8 Unicode]
hEncode :: Handle -> [Unicode] -> IO ()
hReencode :: Handle -> [Either Word8 Unicode] -> IO ()
decodeFile :: FilePath -> IO [Either Word8 Unicode]
encodeFile :: FilePath -> [Unicode] -> IO ()
reencodeFile :: FilePath -> [Either Word8 Unicode] -> IO ()
